pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, September 21, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will speak with the Premier of Manitoba, Brian Pallister.

Closed to media.

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver a virtual address to commemorate the 75th anniversary of the United Nations General Assembly.

A livestream of the address will be available at http://webtv.un.org/meetings-events/general-assembly/.
